info.name: Calm Skin for Facebook
info.description:
a skin that removes the adverts, gives shadows to photos, and makes facebook feel more calm, the background is from wikia, 
it a very sky blue colour, this removes adverts from all pages but app pages,
info.additionalInfo:
== Update - July 20 2012 ==

*Fixed the White Patch from Profile Backgrounds with the Timeline.
**This also makes normal profiles have blue toolbar, i checked it, it blends in nicely making it more like it behind the profile in a way :)

== Other Info ==
Background from Wikia

all other credits to Parsonsda :)
